data.persona: I am an organist. I lead a very lucky life. I play the organ in a huge church. The Catholic church gives me money to live and a warm bed to sleep in.
data.description:
You are in the Pew.
The pew is worn from many years of being sat on during services.  It looks fairly basic upon first glance.  But there is something just under the surface, something moving.
There's an old bible, a The pew, and a pulpit here.
The a rat chews on a dropped hymnbook is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I'm going to prepare the cathedral for the worship service
data.mid_motivation: I'm going to play the organ at the worship service
data.long_motivation: I'm going to develop a reputation as a great organist so more people come to church and embrace God
